programme.title: The Daily Sweat of Politics
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke recalls President Lyndon Johnson’s struggle to create Medicare.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke ponders the daily grind of politics, and the struggle of President Lyndon Johnson in getting the whole idea of Medicare turned into law and made a reality.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
